name: Value
description: `Value` components can be used to summarize any kind of data.

props.name: value
props.doc: Value for the value component. Will take precedence over the path value given in the data context.

props.name: defaultValue
props.doc: Default value for the value component. Will not take precedence over the path value given in the data context.

props.name: label
props.doc: Field label to show above the displayed value.

props.name: labelSrOnly
props.doc: Use `true` to make the label only readable by screen readers.

props.name: help
props.doc: Provide help content for the field using `title` and `content` as a string or React.Node. Additionally, you can set `open` to `true` to display the inline help, set the `breakout` property to `false` to disable the breakout of the inline help content, or use `renderAs` set to `dialog` to render the content in a [Dialog](/uilib/components/dialog/) (recommended for larger amounts of content).

props.name: transformLabel
props.doc: Transforms the label before it gets displayed. Receives the label as the first parameter. The second parameter is a object containing the `convertJsxToString` function.

props.name: inheritLabel
props.doc: Use `true` to inherit the label from a visible (rendered) field with the same path.

props.name: inheritVisibility
props.doc: Use `true` to inherit the visibility from a field with the same path. You can find more info in the [Value section](/uilib/extensions/forms/Value/#inherit-visibility-from-fields-based-on-path).

props.name: showEmpty
props.doc: Shows the value even if it is empty.

props.name: placeholder
props.doc: Text showing in place of the value if no value is given.

props.name: path
props.doc: JSON Pointer for where the data for this input is located in the source dataset.

props.name: inline
props.doc: For showing the value inline (not as a block element).

props.name: maxWidth
props.doc: Use `auto` for no max-width (use browser default), `small`, `medium` or `large` for predefined standard max widths. Defaults to `large`.

props.name: transformIn
props.doc: Transforms the `value` before its displayed in the value component.
